sourcesContent:
import * as React from "react" import * as Svg from "../Svg" import * as Db from "../data/Database" class ActivityCard extends React.Component { render() { this.data = Db.activity_details[this.props.activity] this.data["title"] = this.props.activity return (
{this.data.title} {this.data.price}
{this.data.date}
{this.data.description}
{Svg.location(this.state.isLiked)} {this.data.location}
{Svg.star(!this.state.isLiked)}
) } } export default ActivityCard
